us.pserver.revok.container

Class Authenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.revok.container.Authenticator

  • public class Authenticator
extends java.lang.Object
    Execute authentications of Credentials objects against a CredentialsSource database.
    Version:
    1.1 - 201506
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno@pserver.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Authenticator(CredentialsSource cs)
      Default Constructor receive a CredentialsSource for execute athentications.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Authenticator

        public Authenticator(CredentialsSource cs)
        Default Constructor receive a CredentialsSource for execute athentications.
        Parameters:
        cs - CredentialsSource

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public Credentials authenticate(Credentials cred)
                         throws AuthenticationException
        Execute an authentication of the Credentials object agains the CredentialsSource database. This method will throw an AuthenticationException if the authentication fails.
        Parameters:
        cred - Credentials wich will be authenticated.
        Returns:
        The Credentials object stored in server side.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - In case the authentication fail for any reason (Access denied, invalid Credentials, etc.).
